revised_title: Electro-Chemical Decomposition of Animal Fluids: Observations on Albumen and Mucus
tldr: The author, William Brande, examines the composition of animal fluids, particularly albumen and mucus, using electro-chemical decomposition. He discovers that the voltaic apparatus can extract alkalies and acids from these fluids, leading him to question whether mucus might be a compound of albumen with soda.
